DOC.brief_title: A Multi-center Acute Efficacy Trial GFX For Reduction Glabellar Furrowing
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose research study evaluate acute ability GFX reduce glabellar furrowing . Patients present investigator correction glabellar furrow , classify per Rated Numeric Kinetic Line Scale Score Facial Wrinkles Secondary Hyperkinetic Function ( Note : Class 1 Higher ) 7 ( Appendix N ) candidate study . All patient must consent procedure agree complete post treatment evaluation visit .
DOC.criteria: Has medical contraindication Presenting correction glabellar furrow , classify per Rated Numeric Kinetic Line Scale Score Facial Wrinkles Secondary Hyperkinetic Function ( Class 1 Higher ) candidate study Is least 18 year age Signs write informed consent Understands accepts obligation present schedule followup visit Understands GFX procedure may successful . Has injection botulinum toxin target area within previous 3 month still exhibit positive cosmetic effect glabellar furrow Has silicone , fat , collagen synthetic material place glabellar region surgical correction excision glabellar furrow Has know bleed disorder Has receive anticipate receive antiplatelets , anticoagulant thrombolytic cancer therapy Is receive systemic corticosteroid anabolic steroid ( standard dos inhale nasal corticosteroid acceptable ) Has history chronic recurrent infection compromise immune system Has severe allergy manifest history anaphylaxis Has know lidocaine hypersensitivity Is enrol another study Is Pregnant Has history keloid formation The investigator believe patient suitable candidate GFX procedure , likely receive cosmetic benefit .
